snippet: The editor of Sham, a new weekly newspaper, said coverage of the war in Syria had been skewed by exaggerations and misinformation.
abstract: Several newspapers have emerged in Syria to counter coverage of war in country that has been skewed by exaggerations and misinformation.

byline.contributor: Hala Droubi contributed reporting from Antakya, and Sebnem Arsu from Gaziantep, Turkey.

lead_paragraph: The editor of Sham, a new weekly newspaper, said coverage of the war in Syria had been skewed by exaggerations and misinformation.

headline.seo: Syrian Newspapers Emerge to Fill Out War Reporting
headline.main: Syrian Newspapers Emerge to Fill Out War Reporting
headline.print_headline: Syrian Newspapers Emerge To Fill Out War Reporting

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
